definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
ox/cattle/scalper of tickets etc/to fail to show up/to break a promise
Taurus (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: Why should cattle not graze near yew trees?
sentences.chinese: 为什么牛不在紫杉附近吃草？

sentences.english: Suarez and Andy Carroll could be a real handful together next season.
sentences.chinese: 小苏和安迪下赛季的搭档一定会很牛逼的。

sentences.english: He's pasturing his cattle on the top meadow.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经把牛放到牧场上吃草去了。

sentences.english: On the internet, broken links are abundant.
sentences.chinese: 在互联网上，失效链接如汗牛充犊。

sentences.english: Cattle in North Korea being checked for signs of FMD.
sentences.chinese: 正在查看朝鲜的牛是否有口蹄疫症状。

sentences.english: The cattle trod down the wild flowers in the field.
sentences.chinese: 牛把田里的野花踩坏了。

sentences.english: Above and below the lions and bulls were wreaths of hammered work.
sentences.chinese: 边上有小座，狮子和牛以下有垂下的璎珞。

sentences.english: The cows were branded with an A in a circle.
sentences.chinese: 那些牛被烙上了加圆圈的A字。

sentences.english: Financial tycoons are notorious for their exorbitant salaries.
sentences.chinese: 金融大款们就是牛在高薪。

sentences.english: This law also applies if the bull gores a son or daughter.
sentences.chinese: 牛无论触了人的儿子或是女儿，必照这例办理。

sentences.english: I am as awkward as a cow on skates.
sentences.chinese: 我笨得像一头穿着溜冰鞋的牛。

sentences.english: I think the cup of 34E is absolutely niubable, you should be proud of.
sentences.chinese: 我认为34E罩杯是很值得牛逼的，你应该感到骄傲。

sentences.english: The picture showed a charming pastoral scene of cows drinking from a stream.
sentences.chinese: 表现了牛在溪边饮水的迷人的田园风光。

sentences.english: The best beef is obtained from steers and heifers (female cows that have not calved ).
sentences.chinese: 最好的牛肉来自食用牛和小母牛。

sentences.english: Even cattle, which feed on alfalfa, depend on bees.
sentences.chinese: 就连以紫花苜蓿为食的牛也要依靠蜜蜂。

definition: variant of 匹[pi3]/classifier for cloth: bolt
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
(coll.) leading light/superstar/badass/(coll.) higher-priced model of Lamborghini
the person himself/I (humble form used in speeches)/oneself/myself/in person/personal
